titleStmt.title: Certayne briefe rules of the regiment or construction of the eyght partes of speche in englishe and latine.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Title within woodcut architectural frame on which is engraved: "1534".
Reproduction of the original in Bodleian Library.
